function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["Spread of highly contagious virus with high mortality rates.","Incomplete or no reporting of key data randomisation, blinding, numerators and denominators, interventions, outcomes, attrition of participants, confidence intervals, cluster coefficients .","Potential biases such as cash incentives given to participants.","Inadequate randomisation in randomised studies leading to biased results.","Presence of potential confounders in non-randomised studies affecting the accuracy of results.","Inconsistent data extraction and aggregation leading to unreliable pooled estimates.","Exclusion of vaccines and antivirals from the study","High incidence rates of respiratory viruses during major epidemics worldwide","Serious pandemic viral infections such as sars and avian influenza","Potential economic collapse","Prevalence of covid-19 in the built environment"]}
